code: import React from'react';export var isH1orH2=function isH1orH2(isH2,headingText,classes){var H1orH2="";if(isH2.toLowerCase()=="h2"){H1orH2=React.createElement("h2",{class:classes},headingText);}else{H1orH2=React.createElement("h1",{class:classes},headingText);}return H1orH2;};export var setMaxHeights=function setMaxHeights(selecterPath){var selectedHeights=document.querySelectorAll(selecterPath);var pheightArray=Array.from(selectedHeights).map(function(p){return p.clientHeight;});var maxHeight=Math.max.apply(null,pheightArray);for(var i=0;i<Array.from(selectedHeights).length;i++){Array.from(selectedHeights)[i].style.height=maxHeight+"px";}};export var checkNullOrEmpty=function checkNullOrEmpty(content){if(content==undefined||content==""||content==null){return false;}else return true;};export var capitalize=function capitalize(s){var label=s.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+s.slice(1);if(typeof label!=='string')return'';return label.match(/[A-Z][a-z]+/g).join(" ");};export var GetColDataval=function GetColDataval(ColumnCount){var colClass="";if(ColumnCount==1){colClass="col-12";}if(ColumnCount==2){colClass="col-6";}else if(ColumnCount==3){colClass="col-4";}else if(ColumnCount==4){colClass="col-3";}else if(ColumnCount==5){colClass="col-1-5";}else{colClass="col-2";}return colClass;};
